categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: At some point the Knights of Ren were hired to raid the penal world of Osseriton. During the raid, the Knights freed prisoners and liberated the dungeon ship known as the Night Buzzard, which they modified to become their own transport.
Sometime before or by 28 ABY, the Knights of Ren were hired to raid the the penal world of Osseriton.
During the course of the raid, the Knights of Ren freed prisoners, as well as liberating a dungeon ship known as the Night Buzzard.

After the raid, the Night Buzzard became the Knights' own transport. The Knights made several alterations to the starship to better suit their tastes, including altering the vessel's appearance to match their dark aesthetic.
